ability.name: snowy-guard
ability.description: When hit by an Ice-type move, this Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def are increased.

ability.name: ice-body
ability.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

forms.name: Frostifur
forms.description: This fluffy Pokémon has a coat of snow-like fur that helps it blend into its wintry surroundings. The fur is said to have insulating properties, allowing Frostifur to survive in extreme cold.

evolutions.name: Frostifur
evolutions.description: This fluffy Pokémon has a coat of snow-like fur that helps it blend into its wintry surroundings. The fur is said to have insulating properties, allowing Frostifur to survive in extreme cold.

evolutions.name: Blizzuff
evolutions.description: After evolving, the fur on this Pokémon becomes dense and icy. It can create powerful blizzards by flapping its large wings.

item.name: icy-rock
item.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Hail when used by the holder.

move.name: ice-shard
move.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

move_learn_method.name: level-up
move_learn_method.description: A move is learned by leveling up.

version_group.name: sword-shield
version_group.description: The Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield games.

move_learn_method.description: A move is learned by leveling up.

version_group.name: ultra-sun-ultra-moon
version_group.description: The Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon games.

ability.name: photosynthesis
ability.description: This Pokémon gains a small amount of HP at the end of each turn if the weather is sunny.

ability.name: chlorophyll
ability.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokémon's Speed is doubled.

forms.name: Glimmervine
forms.description: This vine-like Pokémon emits a soft glow at night, illuminating its surroundings. Its glow is believed to attract prey, which it then ensnares with its tendrils.

evolutions.name: Glimmervine
evolutions.description: This vine-like Pokémon emits a soft glow at night, illuminating its surroundings. Its glow is believed to attract prey, which it then ensnares with its tendrils.

evolutions.name: Luminaria
evolutions.description: Upon evolving, this Pokémon develops bioluminescent flowers that emit a captivating aroma, luring in prey and mesmerizing onlookers.

item.name: miracle-seed
item.description: A Pokémon held item that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

move.name: energy-ball
move.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

move_learn_method.name: level-up
move_learn_method.description: A move is learned by leveling up.

ability.name: turboblaze
ability.description: This Pokémon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokémon.

forms.name: Reshiram
forms.description: This Pokémon is said to have been born in the heat of a volcanic eruption. It is said to fly across the sky, burning everything to ash.

item.name: charcoal
item.description: A Pokémon held item that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

move.name: dragon-pulse
move.description: The user attacks with a shock wave generated by its gaping mouth. This may also make the target flinch.
